com.netscape.cms.servlet.csadmin

Class ConfigurationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netscape.cms.servlet.csadmin.ConfigurationUtils

  • public class ConfigurationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for functions to be used both by the RESTful installer and the UI Panels.
    Author:
    alee
